body_html:
we do not plan to implement NMN in pytorch, if you want you can implement it yourself :)

We gave you all the tools in pytorch to build it, now go have fun.

Do you think there is any dependency to be resolved in pyTorch if we want to do it?
I am not sure what you mean by dependency to be resolved.

body:
we do not plan to implement NMN in pytorch, if you want you can implement it yourself :)

We gave you all the tools in pytorch to build it, now go have fun.

> Do you think there is any dependency to be resolved in pyTorch if we want to do it?
I am not sure what you mean by dependency to be resolved.
